Posts.EditableText: I'm looking for a way to hide some verbs. For example there's an enemy template that has a list of verbs, but not all enemies will use them. I don't want to remove them because that may be the one that I copy and paste in a new room. Is there a way to hide them?
Posts.HTML: I'm looking for a way to hide some verbs. For example there's an enemy template that has a list of verbs, but not all enemies will use them. I don't want to remove them because that may be the one that I copy and paste in a new room. Is there a way to hide them?

Posts.EditableText:
Verbs assessability is controlled the by the built-in 'displayverbs' and 'inventoryverbs' Stringlist Attributes (which you can add/remove from these lists), see Pixie's guide on this stuff:

http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/samples/topic/5023/how-to-use-display-verbs-and-inventory-verbs-effectively
